results.lead_paragraph: JOSEPHINE PIAZZA'S name has never appeared on a theatre marquee, although she is celebrating her thirtieth year in show business. And she has never received credit in a Playbill, although she has been seen by more theatregoers than most Broadway stars.

headline.main: COMEBACK AT VIRGINIA BEACH; Coastal Resort Repairs March Storm Damage --Art Show Slated

results.snippet: PORTSMOUTH, Va.--In the great storm of last March, which did such widespread damage to shore  resorts, the angry Atlantic hurdied sea walls and protective dunes, smashing boardwalks, cottages and motels at Virginia Beach. But those who counted among...
results.lead_paragraph: PORTSMOUTH, Va.--In the great storm of last March, which did such widespread damage to shore resorts, the angry Atlantic hurdied sea walls and protective dunes, smashing boardwalks, cottages and motels at Virginia Beach. But those who counted among the casualties the resort's traditional Boardwalk Art show and celebrated summer season were unduly pessimistic.

headline.main: KENNEDY THANKS NAVY RESERVISTS; Tells Group at Otis Air Base Their Service Was Vital

results.snippet: HYANNIS PORT, Mass., July 20 (UPI)--President Kennedy thanked a group of Naval Reservists today for their service in a year of active duty. He told them that they had been called up only "after a most serious consultation by the Joint Chiefs of Staff...
results.lead_paragraph: HYANNIS PORT, Mass., July 20 (UPI)--President Kennedy thanked a group of Naval Reservists today for their service in a year of active duty. He told them that they had been called up only "after a most serious consultation by the Joint Chiefs of Staff and the Congress and by the President of the United States."

headline.main: LUNAR SOIL TEST PART OF MISSION; Astronauts to Have Leeway on Tasks to Perform
